articles.author: David Moye
articles.title: Democratic Rep Challenges James Comer To Impeach Joe Biden — And Gets Crickets
articles.description: "I'll make the motion, Mr. Chairman," said Rep. Jared Moskowitz. "You can second it, right? Make the motion to impeach President Biden. Go ahead."
articles.content: Rep. Jared Moskowitz (D-Fla.) did something counterintuitive Wednesday during a House committee hearing: He asked the committees leader, Rep. James Comer (R-Ky.), to second a motion to impeach Presid… [+4560 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
